select name,win,lose,total,ground,leader FROM (SELECT result1.*,ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT name,win,lose,total,ground,leader FROM team
OR name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
OR leader LIKE '%'||#{leader}||'%'
OR ground LIKE '%'||#{ground}||'%'
ORDER BY win DESC) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM team
OR name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
OR leader LIKE '%'||#{leader}||'%'
OR ground LIKE '%'||#{ground}||'%'
